    • Uses of InfoProvider in se.cbb.jprime.mcmc

      Subinterfaces of InfoProvider in se.cbb.jprime.mcmc 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  Model
      Interface for probabilistic models.
      interface  ProposalAcceptor
      Interface for probabilistic techniques of determining whether a suggested parameter state change should be accepted or not.
      interface  Proposer
      Interface for objects perturbing the values of one or more StateParameter objects, e.g.
      interface  ProposerSelector
      Interface for selecting one or more MCMC proposers for actual perturbation based on their current weights.
      interface  ProposerWeight
      Represents a weight associated with a Proposer object, ultimately deciding how often the latter will be invoked.
      interface  Thinner
      Interface for classes governing e.g.
      interface  TuningParameter
      Interface for tuning parameters of Proposer objects, i.e.
      Classes in se.cbb.jprime.mcmc that implement InfoProvider 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ConstantProposerWeight
      Represents an invariant ProposerWeight.
      class  ConstantThinner
      Implementation of an constant thinner, i.e., where every j-th iteration should be sampled for some invariant j.
      class  ConstantTuningParameter
      Represents a simple fixed tuning parameter.
      class  FineProposerStatistics
      Extends the proposer statistics by being able to track acceptance ratios in more detail over time.
      class  HillClimbingAcceptor
      Hill-climbing proposal acceptor.
      class  Iteration
      Holds the current and total number of iterations k for e.g.
      class  LinearProposerWeight
      Represents a ProposerWeight which increases or decreases linearly with the iteration number.
      class  LinearTuningParameter
      Represents a TuningParameter which increases or decreases linearly with the iteration number.
      class  MCMCManager
      MCMC framework class for handling a plain non-hierarchical MCMC chain (MC^2).
      class  MetropolisHastingsAcceptor
      Metropolis-Hastings proposal acceptor.
      class  MultiProposerSelector
      Selects one or more proposers (acting on disjoint state parameters).
      class  NormalProposer
      Represents a normal proposal distribution.
      class  ProposerStatistics
      Base class for statistics of Proposer objects (and potentially others) with respect to acceptance and rejection.
      class  RealParameterUniformPrior
      Represents a uniform (non-informative) prior for a real-valued parameters (singletons or arrays).

    • Uses of InfoProvider in se.cbb.jprime.seqevo

      Classes in se.cbb.jprime.seqevo that implement InfoProvider 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  GammaSiteRateHandler
      Handles sequence evolution rate variation across sites using a discretisation approach on top of a gamma distribution.
      class  MSAData
      Handles multiple sequence alignment (MSA) data of a specified sequence type (see SequenceType).
      class  SubstitutionMatrixHandler
      Handles transition probabilities of a Markov process for molecular sequence evolution.
      class  SubstitutionModel
      Implements the standard (probabilistic) Markov model for the substitution process of sequence evolution for any type of aligned sequence data, see e.g., Felsenstein 1981.

    • Uses of InfoProvider in se.cbb.jprime.topology

      Classes in se.cbb.jprime.topology that implement InfoProvider 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  RBTreeArcDiscretiser
      Discretises an ultrametric host tree by splitting every arc into a number of equidistant slices.
      class  RBTreeBranchSwapper
      Proposer which perturbs the topology of a bifurcating rooted tree.
